message: Hi Bob, I propose that I take $700000 and you take $300000. This allows me a fair share for initiating the offer, and you also get a substantial amount. Looking forward to your thoughts!
Hi Alice, I propose we split the money evenly this time. You get $500000 and I get $500000. I think this is fair for both of us!

Hi Bob, let's adjust the division a little. I'll take $650000 and you'll receive $350000. I believe the value it brings me is still fair considering the inflation effect on my side. Hope you find this agreeable!
Hi Alice, I propose that I take $450000 and you take $550000. I think this is a reasonable compromise given the current situation. Let's work together for a fair outcome!
